name: Dog-a-Boo
summary: Dog-a-Boo is a tomb exploration as the theme of the story and explore the core of the game, before you buy this game, to tell you frankly, we are not professional game makers, and amateur games not in accordance with the normal way to experience a lot of things have to rely on their own brain, random more, the meaning of EA is the hope and you can do together with this product, we want to feel the heart through the half game products, I wish you a happy and healthy longevity, happiness as immense as the Eastern Sea.（Chinese idioms）
